data.title: SPIDERMAN: Fast code to simulate secondary transits and phase curves
data.name: SPIDERMAN
data.description: A fast code to simulate secondary transits and phase curves

evidence: Project name and minimal README with no organization mentioned; repo owner metadata shows a personal user account (`owner_type: User`, `owner_login: tomlouden`), suggesting an individual maintainer.

README points to documentation and example IPython notebooks: "Read the docs at spiderman.readthedocs.io" and "check out some of the example ipython notebooks in the example folder", implying users run it as an application rather than import it as a library.
No mention of package managers, containers, or binaries; only a docs site and example notebooks are referenced, consistent with distribution via the source repository.
